name: Lakers vs. Celtics and the NBA Playoffs
name_original: Lakers vs. Celtics and the NBA Playoffs
description:
Lakers vs. Celtics and the NBA Playoffs is a sports game developed by Electronic Arts. It was originally released in 1989. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Lakers vs. Celtics and the NBA Playoffs is available on PC.
It was scored by Rob Hubbard.
